document: PREDICTION MODEL FOR THE ONSET OF EDGE-EFFECT DELAMINATION AT HOLES IN COMPOSITE LAMINATES by Doron Shalev Dissertation submitted to the Faculty of the Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University in partial fulfillment of the requirements for the degree of DOCTOR OF PHILOSOPHY in Engineering Science and Mechanics APPROVED: K.
